thread.title: Lahore bomb blast 'kills five' - BBC News
thread.title_full: Lahore bomb blast 'kills five' - BBC News

title: Lahore bomb blast 'kills five' - BBC News
text:
Lahore bomb blast 'kills five' 23 February 2017 Read more about sharing. Close share panel At least five people have been killed in a bomb attack in the Pakistani city of Lahore, officials say. 
The blast ripped through a shopping area, wounding another 15 people. 
Pakistan has been hit by a wave of bombings claimed by Islamist militant groups in recent days. There was no immediate claim for the latest attack. 
Police now say 90 people were killed in an attack at a shrine in the town of Sehwan last week which was claimed by the so-called Islamic State (IS). 
In response, Pakistan launched a security crackdown - which included closing border crossings with Afghanistan - and claims it killed 100 militants. Related Topics
